Message:
My master’s birthday
was fast approaching.
I wanted to get
a present for her,

but things from
the forest won’t do—
they’re all too familiar to her.

After all, she’s the one
who knows this place best.

So I racked my brain for hours
trying to find a good idea.

That’s it! The flowers that
I bloomed with my magic!

It’ll be perfect!
I’ll bloom lots of flowers
and give her a bouquet
for her birthday!

With that in mind,
I closed my eyes and
concentrated on my magic.
